findings.notes: Appropriate controls are in place for financial reporting
Some inconsistencies in expense categorization were identified
All tax filings were completed accurately and on time

summary: Overall, the financial statements present fairly, in all material respects, the financial position of ACME Corporation as of June 30, 2024.
recommendations: Implement additional training for expense reporting procedures
Consider enhanced reconciliation processes for accounts receivable
Update financial control documentation to reflect recent system changes
